attributes.action: Ban the sale of Genetically Modified Food in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to ask the government to ban the sale of genetically modified foods in the United Kingdom.

These foods have been proven to cause damage to animals and are highly likely to be damaging to humans too.

I personally feel these foods should not be developed at all.

If you agree that food containing genetically modified ingredients or that are wholly genetically modified should not be sold within the UK then please sign this petition.
